mapper.select: SELECT d.detailid, d.itemid, p.custid AS cust_id, p.purchaseid, i.image AS item_image, i.pname AS item_name, p.totalprice AS p_totalprice, i.price AS item_price, d.count FROM detail d INNER JOIN item i ON d.itemid = i.itemid INNER JOIN purchase p ON d.purchaseid = p.purchaseid

SELECT d.detailid, d.itemid, p.custid AS cust_id, p.purchaseid, i.image AS item_image, i.pname AS item_name, p.totalprice AS p_totalprice, i.price AS item_price, d.count FROM detail d INNER JOIN item i ON d.itemid = i.itemid INNER JOIN purchase p ON d.purchaseid = p.purchaseid WHERE p.custid=#{custid}
